about_the_game:
Get notified about our funding launch. Find Fantastyc Murder Mystery on:

Immerse yourself in a unique asynchronous multiplayer experience

In Fantastyc Murder Mystery, you solve player-committed murders or take up weapons to do the deed yourself.

Play as murderer in unique randomly generated levels

Every murder demands meticulous planning, as detectives worldwide piece together evidence to crack the case.

Play as a detective and solve real player-generated murders

Gather clues and interrogate NPCs to unravel each unique mystery.

Spells, Perks, and Modifiers make it truly FANTASTYC

Think with portals, turn witnesses into frogs, or transform yourself into a prop. With the powers of the Enigma Tomes, you can pull from the arcane to create the most creative crime scenes!

2 Game Modes - Play together or on your own

  • Play live with your friends in an online lobby where you try to solve their committed murder before they solve yours!
  • Interact with the many already uploaded cases on the Noticeboard and upload your best murders for people worldwide to try out!

Leaderboards

Compete against the world and become the best murderer or detective this realm has ever seen!

short_description: Play a murder mystery where you are the murderer or the detective. Other players worldwide will scrutinize your every move as they attempt to solve your murders. Sift through evidence, and uncover the killer in unique player-generated crime scenes.
